thread.title: Manny Pacquiao news: Amir Khan smashes rivals in vote for next opponent | Metro News
thread.title_full: Manny Pacquiao news: Amir Khan smashes rivals in vote for next opponent | Metro News

author: Coral Barry For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Manny Pacquiao news: Amir Khan smashes rivals in vote for next opponent | Metro News
text:
Search Metro Follow us Manny Pacquiao asked fans to pick next opponent and Amir Khan got 48 per cent of the vote Coral Barry for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 15 Feb 2017 9:55 am Manny Pacquiao is targeting another fight (Picture: Getty) 
Manny Pacquiao’s fans have chosen Amir Khan as the legend’s next opponent in the ring. Conor McGregor fires final warning to UFC and Mayweather as he meets with former UFC owner 
The 38-year-old asked his Twitter followers this week to vote on who they would like him to face next with British rivals Khan and Kell Brook on the four-man shortlist. 
The results are now in and Khan smashed his rival fighters collecting 48 per cent of the votes. 
Brook just about edges Terence Crawford with 24 per cent of the votes while Australian contender Jeff Horn is left behind with just seven per cent. Who do you want me to fight next in the UAE? 
— Manny Pacquiao (@mannypacquiao) February 12, 2017 Amir Khan is the people’s choice (Picture: Getty) 
Almost 50,000 people voted in the poll as Pacquiao continues his quest to find his next opponent after coming out of retirement. 
Khan is also looking for his next test in the ring after talks with Brook about an all-British clash broke down last month. Pacquiao came out of retirement for a fight last November (Picture: Getty)
